actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to extend its protection to workers employed in the demolition, dismantling, removal, and/or salvaging of public buildings.

summary.text: Extends the minimum wage provisions of the Davis-Bacon Act to workers employed in the demolition, dismantling, removal, and/or salvaging of public buildings. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 276a)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to extend its protection to workers employed in the demolition, dismantling, removal, and/or salvaging of public buildings.
